name: Treasure Ship
skill: Increases the crit rate of 2 allies (ranged priority) by 7%/9% for a limited time.
ability: Slightly increases battle reward drop rate.

additional_data.description: The spirit of a boat on which seven gods are said to ride. Tasked with delivering good luck across the land, she stays pretty busy carrying the gods around...and she goes so fast it's not exactly a pleasant ride, either. Some gods have developed hip and back problems as a result. She's even better known to help sneak spirit agents and their daemons into the locations for their assignments at times.
additional_data.how_to_acquire:
◦ Limited Jewel Summon 24/12/16 - 06/01/17
◦ Trade at Exchange for 25 Mochi 06/01/17 - 11/01/17
additional_data.notes_and_trivia:
◦ Summon rate increased until 06/01/17
◦ Can only be exchanged once

main: "Leave it to me! I'll bring you all the good luck you could ever want!"
summon: "I've come to bring you good fortune!"
